name: Cold Rising
description:
Welcome to Cold Rising. A new survival horror from a solo developer that is designed to test your nerve.

Make your way out of the cold before you freeze and see if you have what it takes to find what you need to stay alive. 

Fire is your friend but stay still for too long and the thing in the shadows will catch you...keep going without stopping though and the cold will get you.  

Let's see if you have what it takes!

(Still in development, will be pre-order only for now, keep an eye on the dev logs!)
